aboutpara: I am a front-end software developer who is driven to solve contemporary issues through creativity. A love for excellent design and seamless functionality permeates every endeavor. I'm eager to use technology and my expertise in client interactions and environmental outcomes to assist teams and individual clients in finding sustainable solutions.

resume.tagline: I'm a software engineer, and UX developer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to tens of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Applied latest emerging technology software and design/user interface trends to update and maintain component applicability. , Planned component development converting mockups into a usable web presence with HTML CSS Javascript/React and Tailwind CSS.

education.universityPara: Software engineering immersive program with an emphasis on Fullstack Web Development.
